title: Boutique Wellness Retreat near Delhi with Daily Dining, Yoga & Meditation
description:
Find nirvana at Siddha Wellness Village, a secluded retreat in Faridabad, just 50km from the busy capital of Delhi. Nestled amid lush green farmlands, the retreat is perfect for those looking for a break from the city, a holistic staycation or a wellness escape. Align mind, body and soul with a wide range of wellness therapies and holistic regimes, carefully curated to nourish from within.

Your wellness escape includes daily set menu breakfast and dinner, a daily 30-minute morning yoga session, a daily 15-minute meditation session, complimentary access to the resort's home theatre and facilities such as a swimming pool, jacuzzi, tennis courts, steam and sauna room, plus complimentary Wi-Fi.

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged five years and under) stays free in existing bedding with breakfast.
offer_address: D1, SRS Farms, Kasna Rd, Akbarpur, Faridabad, Haryana 121001
